data.Name: Healthy Bees
data.Tagline: Stronger Bees, Healthier Hives - The All-Natural Way
data.About:
Our mission is simple - to ensure the survival of honey bees for generations to come. As a vital component of our global food supply - and ultimately, our survival - honey bees are facing a growing crisis known as Colony Collapse Disorder (CCD).

Healthy Bees aims to provide an all-in-one solution to address all the major causes of CCD.

From the smallest backyard beehive to the largest apiary, Healthy Beesâ„¢ patties and powders are the only all-natural products on the market that scientifically improve the health of hives while strengthening the honey bee immune system.

To learn more about Healthy Bees, visit our website today at www.healthybeesllc.com.
